name: Trainbow
description:
Trainbow!

Get on your vintage steam engine and ride through hyperspace with your friends!

Trainbow is a local multiplayer pvp game based in a wonderous world, where humans are forced to traverse the universe on old rusty steam engines. Your mission is not one of glory or kindness. No! You will destroy your oponent with the power of white paint!


The rules are simple:

  1.  You and your friend both race on a track made out of 5 colors.
  2. Your main goal is to change tracks to avoid obstacles and collect white paint.
  3. With white paint, you can cut off one or more of your opponent's tracks!
  4. Whoever survives the longest - wins!

May the gods of the everdrying astral paint be with you. Good luck!




________________
Authors: Radek Otręba, Piotr Sudoł, Kuba Łukasiewicz, Aron Pietroń
